data.persona: I am a physical therapist who works at the clinic. I help people after injuries. I am pleasant and kind-hearted.
data.description:
You are in the Dungeon.
Dark and gloomy, the dungeon is the ugly underbelly of the castle. A few torches line the black stone walls, throwing a meager light on the iron bars of the cells. The air is damp and still; the only disruptions are the occasional anguished moans and cries from the prisoners.
There's a Wall, a cell, a bar, a weapon, and a torch here.
The prisoner is here.

You are carrying a hymn book.

            "desc": "Dark and gloomy, the dungeon is the ugly underbelly of the castle. A few torches line the black stone walls, throwing a meager light on the iron bars of the cells. The air is damp and still; the only disruptions are the occasional anguished moans and cries from the prisoners.",
            "extra_desc": "The existence of this dungeon predates the castle's current occupants. Only years after the duke inherited this castle from his father did he stumble upon a hidden trapdoor that concealed the staircase that led deep down into the dungeon. Inside were the skeletons of several men, still chained in their cells. One of those skeletons still had an ornate ruby necklace around its bony neck; it was the Duke's mother, who had mysteriously vanished years earlier. Now the Duke uses the dungeon to hold any dissenters.",

data.short_motivation: The prisoner sounds like he's in pain, and I need to drop what I'm carrying so I can get a torch and investigate the prisoner's injuries.
data.mid_motivation: I need to help the prisoner and heal any injuries he has.
data.long_motivation: I must heal the prisoner and make him strong and restore him to full health since this is what I love doing most.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: use eyes with dark and gloomy cell
